desc: The X-Files Preservation Collection is the largest known collection of Props, Wardrobe, Set Dressing, Production items, and all other things X-Files. Our purpose is to preserve the history of The X-Files, to celebrate the work of the people that brought the show to life, and to share with the fandom.

layout.text: The TRUTH IS in SarAtOGA SPriNgs

Welcome to the world's largest collection of screen-used props, costumes, and set dressings from The X-Files. Our collection has been curated from a number of sources throughout the years and is now finally on permanent display in our museum space in Saratoga Springs, NY.
